casebody.data:
James T. Kearney et al. v. State of Connecticut et al. Martin B. Burke, for the appellees (plaintiffs). Frank B. Cochran, for the appellants (intervening defendant Robert Santaeroce et al.). Frank Cochran, in support of the motion. Argued October 19 decided October 19, 1977 Submitted October 18

decided October 19, 1977

The plaintiffs’ motion to dismiss the appeal from the Superior Court in New London County is denied.

The motion by the intervening defendants Robert and Nancy Santaeroce for permission to waive the printing requirements of their supplemental brief without compliance with § 723 of the Practice Book in the appeal from the Superior Court in New London County is denied.
